page.title: 15TRIMDON COMMUNITY CENTRE.
page.content: SINCE SCHOOLS WENT OVER TO {COMPREHENSIVE EDUCATION,}MANY LARGE SECONDARY SCHOOLS HAVE BECOME PRIMARY SCHOOLS.THEY HAVE MORE CLASSROOMS AND FACILTIES THAN THEY NEED.SO THAT THESE ARE NOT WASTED,{DURHAM COUNTY COUNCIL IS DEVELOPING THESE SCHOOLS SO THAT THEY CAN BE USED BY THE {LOCAL PEOPLE, IN THE DAYTIME AS WELL AS AT NIGHT.THE COMMUNITY CENTRE AT{TRIMDON}IS LIKE THIS.WHEN THEY ARE NOT USED BY SCHOOL CHILDREN THE{GYM}AND{PLAYING FIELDS CAN BE USED BY PEOPLE IF THEY BECOME {MEMBERS.}THEY CAN PLAY{BADMINGTON, {SQUASH,BASKETBALL}AND{FOOTBALL}OR {CRICKET.}THE LARGE SCHOOL HALL IS USED FOR{DANCES}AND{DISCOS}IN THE EVENINGS. CLASSROOMS ARE USED FOR{NIGHT-CLASSES IN{WOODWORK,NEEDLEWORK}OR{KEEP-FIT. THERE IS EVEN A BAR WHERE PEOPLE CAN RELAX WITH A DRINK.THE CENTRE IS USED BY LOTS OF LOCALS IN THE AREA.
